artist: Artist: Katsushika Hokusai; Poet: Shinratei Manzō
dimension:
37 1/8 x 11 in. (94.3 x 27.94 cm) (image)
71 3/4 x 15 15/16 in. (182.25 x 40.48 cm) (overall, without roller)
inscription:
たはれ女の詞を　まねて長うひく　春の柳の　みとりやう／＼　森羅亭
Tawareme no kotoba o / manete nagō hiku / haru no yanagi no / midori yō yō
In imitation of a young courtesans\' argot, the lush green strands of a willow in spring stretch out extra long.
by Shinratei (seal: Takara)
(transl. John T. Carpenter)
medium: Ink and light color on paper
title: Strolling Courtesan
